title: ogur.dev - Gaming Ecosystem
summary: Comprehensive gaming tools ecosystem: Discord bots, automation, centralized license and user management.
content:
## Overview

ogur.dev is my brand under which I create tools for gamers and gaming communities. The ecosystem consists of several interconnected projects.

## Main Components

### Ogur.Sentinel

Boss respawn notification system for MMORPG games. Consists of:

- **Desktop Timer** - WPF application for tracking respawn times
- **Discord Bot** - notifications on voice and text channels
- **API** - central timer and user management
- **Worker** - background service for notification scheduling

Stack: .NET 8, WPF, NetCord (Discord), PostgreSQL, Docker

### Ogur.FishBot

Fishing automation bot for online games. Uses computer vision to detect in-game events.

Stack: .NET 8, OpenCV, WPF

### Ogur.Hub

Central management panel for all ogur.dev applications:

- License system with device fingerprinting
- User and subscription management
- Statistics dashboard
- Automatic application updates

Stack: .NET 8, Blazor, PostgreSQL

## Infrastructure

The entire ecosystem runs on VPS with:

- Docker + Docker Compose
- Traefik as reverse proxy
- Watchtower for automatic updates
- GitHub Actions CI/CD

## Challenges

- Migration from Discord.NET to NetCord due to better voice support
- Implementing piracy-resistant license system
- State synchronization between desktop app and Discord bot
